named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_SUBCATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT category FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Category category WHERE category.defaultParentCategory = :defaultParentCategory

named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORY_BY_URL_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT category FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Category category WHERE category.urlKey = :urlKey

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_SUB_CATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT categoryxref.subCategory FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.CategoryCategory categoryxref WHERE categoryxref.category = :category AND categoryxref.subCategory.activeStartDate <= CURRENT_DATE AND (categoryxref.subCategory.activeEndDate > CURRENT_DATE OR categoryxref.subCategory.activeEndDate = null) ORDER BY categoryxref.displayOrder
